origin.morigins.floran.name: Floran
origin.morigins.floran.description: A species of plant people that obtain their nutrients from the sun and gain strength from water.
origin.morigins.glass_golem.name: Glass Golem
origin.morigins.glass_golem.description: Beings made of pure glass, these individuals do not have to eat, breathe, or worry about most environmental dangers.
origin.morigins.inchling.name: Inchling
origin.morigins.inchling.description: A subspecies of humans that are incredibly small. They utilize their size to hide from enemies and navigate small spaces.
origin.morigins.piglin.name: Piglin
origin.morigins.piglin.description: Natives of the Nether, Piglins are very fond of gold and are experts at utilizing it.
power.morigins.green_thumb.name: Green Thumb
power.morigins.green_thumb.description: You can grow plants at the cost of some food.
power.morigins.photosynthesis.name: Photosynthesis
power.morigins.photosynthesis.descriptio: You are satiated by being exposed to sunlight or by drinking Liquid Sunlight, which can be collected by using a Glass Bottle on a Daylight Detector.
power.morigins.absorbing.name: Absorbing
power.morigins.absorbing.description: You regenerate health and deal more damage when wet.
power.morigins.flammable.name: Flammable
power.morigins.flammable.description: You take twice as much damage from fire.
power.morigins.antivore.name: Antivore
power.morigins.antivore.description: You are unable to eat anything.
power.morigins.inorganic.name: Inorganic
power.morigins.inorganic.description: You are immune to most environmental damage sources, do not need to eat, and have passive health regeneration, albeit slowly.
power.morigins.effect_immunity.name: Effect Immunity
power.morigins.effect_immunity.descripti: You are immune to all potion effects.
power.morigins.glass_cannon.name: Glass Cannon
power.morigins.glass_cannon.description: You deal and take twice as much damage.
power.morigins.bite_sized.name: Bite Sized
power.morigins.bite_sized.description: You are 4 times smaller than a regular person, and this size makes it harder for monsters to detect you. You have 5 less hearts and deal 3 less attack damage.
power.morigins.short_arms.name: Short Arms
power.morigins.short_arms.description: You have 1 less attack range and 2 less build range.
power.morigins.small_appetite.name: Small Appetite
power.morigins.small_appetite.descriptio: You require less food to keep going.
power.morigins.nimble.name: Nimble
power.morigins.nimble.description: You are immune to thorns and velocity based damage.
power.morigins.all_that_glitters.name: All That Glitters
power.morigins.all_that_glitters.descrip: Golden tools deal 2 extra damage and golden armor reduces damage taken by 8% for each armor piece equipped. Golden equipment lasts much longer.
power.morigins.piglin_neutrality.name: Piglin Neutrality
power.morigins.piglin_neutrality.descrip: Piglins do not attack you unless provoked. Brutes will still attack on sight.
power.morigins.crossbow_master.name: Crossbow Master
power.morigins.crossbow_master.descripti: You deal twice as much damage with crossbows.
power.morigins.homesick.name: Homesick
power.morigins.homesick.description: When outside of the Nether, you zombify, becoming undead and immune to fire, but slower.
power.morigins.flabby.name: Flabby
power.morigins.flabby.description: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
power.morigins.soul_spooked.name: Soul Spooked
power.morigins.soul_spooked.description: You are afraid of Soul Fire, becoming weak when near it.
